EmailTemplate.subject: RE: M&T update (1346195364.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Per the introduction from John I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVRLp15W4%2FWLJ6TozXvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVRLp15W4%2FWLJ6TozXvDdZXC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: John Berry [mailto:berry@hireme2.com] Sent: Tuesday, August 28, 2012 4:26 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: Jeff Beech Subject: FW: M&T update Nicolette: Jeff Beech has some questions that I can’t answer about MBO’s services.He’s been at M&T Bank before and there is a possibility that he might go there again in the future.I’m giving him your contact information via this email and he might be contacting you in the near future. Jeff : Below is contact information for Nicolette at MBO partners. Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Corporate statement: -That the activities that I engage in my work with other people, inspires them and enriches their lives. -That I am an opening thru which energy flows from the Source of all life, for the benefit of all. John BerryJohn Berry Personnel Consultants 800-HIRE-ME2berry@hireme2.com <mailto:berry@hireme2.com> From: Jeff B. [mailto:Fitrunner@comcast.net] <mailto:[mailto:Fitrunner@comcast.net]> Sent: Tuesday, August 28, 2012 4:16 PM To: 'John Berry' Subject: RE: M&T update …… And what state do they pay out of? If its New York then you have to add the State Income Tax. …… Do they offer Health Insurance at a group rate? So now I pay the full 13% FICA. Would these people pay the 6.5% FICA that an employer normally pays? If so, this might make a little more sense. And who pays the unemployment insurance? Jeff Beech
